description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Local Records; or, Historical Register of remarkable events which have occurred in Northumberland and Durham, Newcastle-upon-Tyne and Berwick-upon-Tweed, with biographical notices of deceased persons ... 1833 to ... 1866, being a continuation of the work published by ... Mr. John Sykes" Author: FORDYCE, T. - Printer, of Newcastle-upon-Tyne Contributor: SYKES, John - Bookseller, of Newcastle-upon-Tyne Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS", "British Library HMNTS 010358.p.32." Fordyce Issuance: monographic Identifier: 004157862 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
